title: enakkaruL purindiDa
sahitya:
enakkaruL purindiDa vENDum innum ettanai sholluvEn ANDavanE ayyA


anupallavi

  ninakkE nivEdanam vAzhvE appA ninnaDiyArkku varalAmO tAzhvE


caraNam 1    sundararai taDutt-ANDAi tirut-toNDarkku tOnrAt-tuNaiyena ninrAi
vandaruL shiva naTarAjA un vAn karuNaiyinri nAnini vAzhvEn
    caraNam 2   cintaiyum sheigaiyum nIyE innum siriyEnai shOdippdennE en tAyE
bandha vilan-aruttu aruLAi un paTrinrim aTrilEn pashupati sharaNam
